Formula: GDP = Consumption + Investment + Government Spending + (Exports - Imports)
Unemployment Rate = (Unemployed Workers / Total Labor Force) * 100
Interest Rate = (Interest / Principal) * 100
Inflation Rate = [(Price Level Year 2 - Price Level Year 1) / Price Level Year 1] * 100
CCI = [(Positive Consumer Responses - Negative Consumer Responses) / Total Responses] * 100
PMI = [(Number of Positive Indicators / Total Indicators) * 100]
EPS = (Net Income - Preferred Dividends) / Average Outstanding Shares
P/E Ratio = Stock Price / Earnings Per Share (EPS)
D/E Ratio = Total Liabilities / Shareholders' Equity
ROE = Net Income / Shareholders' Equity
FCF = Operating Cash Flow - Capital Expenditures
EBITDA = Net Income + Interest + Taxes + Depreciation + Amortization
VIX = Annualized Volatility of S&P 500 Options
Investor Sentiment = Sentiment Score (calculated using NLP from various sources)
No specific formula (Track timing of lock-up expiration and monitor its impact)
No specific formula (Monitor insider buying and selling activity)
Underpricing = (First-Day Closing Price - IPO Price) / IPO Price * 100
First-Day Price Performance = (Closing Price - Opening Price) / Opening Price * 100
No specific formula (Track volume of shares traded post-IPO)
No specific formula (Evaluate general IPO market conditions, i.e., number of IPOs, average performance)
Sector Growth Rate = (Sector's Revenue Growth / Previous Revenue Period) * 100
Competitive Analysis = No specific formula (Compare company performance with competitors)
